mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.nickname As writer, IFNULL(M.nickname, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__writer FROM article AS A LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM article WHERE 1 AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') AND `body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR `body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')) ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}, boardId = #{boardId}, memberId = #{memberId}
INSERT INTO reply SET relId = #{articleId}, regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode}, `body` = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}
